statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={5.8} , \displaystyle{b}={6.1}, \displaystyle{c}={8.3}, and \displaystyle{d}={9.3}, with diagonal length \displaystyle{e}={8.7} from the intersection of a and d to the intersection of b and c . Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
